meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Justin Nigro Robyn Stone Kay Thanaporn Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6876.

td.p: Justin Nigro, a coalition director originally from Ashtabula, Ohio
Robyn Stone, an actuarial recruiter from Scarsdale, New York
Kay Thanaporn, a health care consultant from Decatur, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $33,199)

tr.td: POP GOES THE WORLD
WHATCHU TALKIN' 'BOUT, WALLACE?
NAME THE AUTOMAKER
TATER TOTS
SOMETHING'S WRONG WITH THIS GUY
WHO KNOWS "C‑P‑R"?
(Alex: Those three letters are coming up in that order in each correct response.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"Waterloo" was this Stockholm group\'s first U.S. pop hit')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "Waterloo" was this Stockholm group's first U.S. pop hit
